title: Position
description: A navigational position that can be used in an entry

latitude.description: The latitude of the geographical location

longitude.description: The longitude of the geographical location

course_made_good.description: The direction in which the vessel is traveling, in degrees

speed_over_ground.description: The velocity of the vessel in meters per second (m/s) over the ground

number_of_satellites.description: The number of satellites used to calculate the position

fix_quality.description: The fix quality as reported by an NMEA receiver (0 = invalid, 1 = GPS fix, 2 = DGPS fix)

antenna_altitude.description: The number of meters above mean sea level of the receiver antenna

geoidal_separation.description: Height of geoid above WGS84 ellipsoid in meters

dgps_data_age.description: The age of the DGPS data in seconds

dgps_station_id.description: The station id of the used DGPS reference station
